C3: Produces a plot of the codewords in the Hamming space. The code is given by a set of codewords in binary. The code has length $n$. If \verb'-metric_balls' $r$ is given, the metric balls of radius $r$ centered around codewords are included in the plot. The command produces several csv files.
Compute the complete weight enumerator of the code $C$.
Compute the minimum distance of the linear code object.
Create the codewords of a Sylvester type Hadamard matrix of order $n$. Here, $n$ must be a power of $2.$
Create the subcode which is fix under the group generated by perm, which acts on the generator matrix by column permutations.
Export a list of codewords using coding as binary numbers.
